price: Зар они болесних срца мисле да Аллах њихове злобе неће да изнесе на видело?
arabic: أَمۡ حَسِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ أَن لَّن يُخۡرِجَ ٱللَّهُ أَضۡغَٰنَهُمۡ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: am ḥasiba alladhīna fī qulūbihim maraḍun an lan yukh'rija al-lahu aḍghānahum
